desc: 나무가 되었어야 하는데 잔디로 변해버린 피부색이 나무와 같은 식물

dictionary.lore: A bud from a certain type of tree that rarely blooms fully, and often transforms into branch colored grass. Most of these trees grow to be grass, but they all have the same qualities regardless of what kind of tree they bloom from. Its true nature is unknown, but it is believed to be a type of fungus or parasitic plant that serves as a catalyst for magical ingredients. Thus, if one comes across it, it is best to collect it.

name: 차탐초
